page.title: 15GURNARD SCHOOL.
page.content: There are 114 children at Gurnard School.The ages are from 4\ to 9 years.There is a hall with a stage,a library and 2 classrooms.Outside there are 2 mobile classrooms,2 playgrounds and 2 fields.There is an indoor swimming pool and we go swimming twice a week.At lunch time you can have dinners or sandwiches in the hall.The hall is also used for gymnastics, assembly,dancing and school plays.We have 4 teachers and a headmistress.The youngest class have a garden outside their classroom where they grow radishes,potatoes and beans.We do projects and sometimes we go on visits to Parkhurst forest,H.M.S.Victory and Carisbrooke Castle.Other things we do are reading,maths,music,art and craft and environmental studies.When we are 9+ we go to Solent Middle School.
